thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An amazing experience
thread.title_full: An amazing experience - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Lundloda
title: An amazing experience
text:
From the moment I landed at the Beijing airport everything was seamless & superb! The airport pickup service - (not expensive) navigated me through Immigration & baggage claim to my car. The driver spoke great English & was helpful. The room was modern, comfortable, and spacious. The health club,pool, and spa was as good as any in the world. The restaurants (particularly Made in China) served delicious food with impeccable service. Despite being busy the staff were unharried and very helpful.
For a frequent business traveler it does not get any better than this.
